title: Tips and Tricks for levelling up honor?
body:
Hi there,

With the upcoming High School League registrations coming up, I was recently informed that I need to have a minimum requirement of honor 2. I am currently sitting at Honor level 1 Checkpoint 2. Registrations close on June 29. Are there any efficient ways to increase honor? Or am I screwed.

Thanks!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Tip  1. get **Good**.
Tip  2. play {{champion:20}} .
Tip  3. stop being **naughty ** boy.

There are no ways to improve honor other than by playing and not being a dickhead.
It shouldn't take you any more than a few days to go from H1 > H2. Just play to win. 

have fun!
